decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards through discard effects like Cathartic Reunion and Thrilling Discovery, allowing for powerful graveyard-based synergies and activations. Cards like Darkblast and Creeping Chill benefit from having cards in the graveyard, while Golgari Thug and Narcomoeba help to put even more cards into the graveyard. Once the graveyard is filled, the deck can generate value and aggression with cards like Prized Amalgam and Ox of Agonas. The deck also utilizes lands like Gemstone Mine and City of Brass to manage its color requirements.
